dcterms:creator: Sharmistha Jat
Hao Tang
Partha Talukdar
Tom Mitchell
dcterms:description: Magnetoencephalography (MEG) dataset used to record brain activity while subjects read simple sentences. Includes three datasets (PassAct1, PassAct2, Act3) with details on the number of sentences and repetitions.
dcterms:title: MEG Dataset

dcterms:creator: Sharmistha Jat
Hao Tang
Partha Talukdar
Tom Mitchell
dcterms:description: A corpus of 256,145 simple sentences created from Wikipedia and NELL SVO triples, focusing on active and passive sentences.
dcterms:title: Simple Sentence Corpus (SSC)
